## The author

This project is currently maintained by **Liviu Ionescu**
([ilg-ul](https://github.com/ilg-ul)),
a senior computer engineer, with expertise in **C++/C embedded systems**,
**RTOSes**, **build tools**, operating systems, compilers
and Internet technologies.

{% assign last_word = packageConfig.longName | split: " " | last | downcase %}
He can be reached at [`<ilg@livius.net>`](mailto:ilg@livius.net).
Please note, this email address is provided as a courtesy.
For all correspondence related to {% if packageConfig.isOrganizationWeb == "true" %}the
**{{longXpackName}}** projects, kindly use the support pages of each individual project{% else%}the **{{longXpackName}}**
{% if last_word != "project" %} project{% endif %}, kindly use the project [support](/docs/support/) page{% endif %}).
